src:
Zavod Prijetno domače prevzela Maja Lampret
07 Nov 2019, 16:20 by M. Ž.
Ivančna Gorica - Maja Lampret je prevzela vodenje Javnega zavoda Prijetno domače, ki ga je občina Ivančna Gorica ustanovila pred leti. Za novo direktorico jo je soglasno potrdil ivanški občinski svet na zadnji 7. redni seji, imenovana pa je za dobo petih let, so sporočili iz občine.
Župan Dušan Strnad je ob imenovanju povedal, da so po odhodu prejšnjega direktorja iskali novo moč. »V Ivančni Gorici vsi skupaj gledamo v našo prihodnost tudi v smeri turizma, zato je pomembno kdo vodi zavod, ki je ustanovljen v ta namen. Dobili smo mlado moč, ki je bila že doslej uspešna v občinski upravi. Pokazala se je kot izjemno prizadevna, vestna in odgovorna sodelavka s številnimi dobrimi idejami«, je še dejal.
Maja Lampret je diplomantka Fakultete za družbene vede in poznana kot dolgoletna kulturna ustvarjalka. Pet let je vodila Zvezo kulturnih društev občine Ivančna Gorica, zadnja leta pa je bila zaposlena v občinski upravi na področju družbenih dejavnosti. V vseh teh letih je bila aktivna na številnih področjih, kjer se je pogosto srečevala tudi z nalogami in delovanjem Zavoda Prijetno domače, so pojasnili na občini.
Kot je povedala svetnikom in svetnicam, v vodenju zavoda vidi izziv, saj verjame v številne možnosti razvoja področja, skupaj s prenovo vsebin in delovanja. Cilj je, da postane občina Ivančna Gorica prepoznavna, razvita ter privlačna turistična in kulturna destinacija.
text:
The Pleasant Home Institute was taken over by Maja Lampret
07 Nov 2019, 15:20 by M. Ž.
Ivancna Gorica - Maja Lampret took over the management of the Pleasant Home Public Institution, which was founded years ago by the municipality of Ivancna Gorica. The new director was unanimously approved by the municipal council of Ivan at the last 7th regular session, and was appointed for a term of five years, the municipality said.
Mayor Dusan Strnad said at the appointment that after the previous director had left, they were seeking new power. “In Ivančna Gorica, we all look together at our future in the direction of tourism as well, so it is important who runs the institution established for this purpose. We were given a young power that has been successful in municipal administration so far. She has proven to be an extremely diligent, conscientious and responsible contributor with many good ideas, ”he said.
Maja Lampret is a graduate of the Faculty of Social Sciences and known as a longtime cultural creator. For five years she headed the Association of Cultural Societies of Ivančna Gorica Municipality, and for the last years she has been employed in the municipal administration in the field of social activities. During all these years she was active in many areas, where she often faced the tasks and activities of the Pleasant Home Institute, the municipality explained.
As she told councilors, she sees the challenge in running the institution as she believes in the many possibilities for the development of the area, along with the renovation of its contents and operations. The goal is to make the municipality of Ivančna Gorica a recognizable, developed and attractive tourist and cultural destination.
